name: table_schema_specs_for_c2m2_encoding_of_dcc_metadata
title: A complete list of schematic specifications for the resources (TSV table files) that will be used to represent C2M2 DCC metadata prior to ingest into the C2M2 database system

resources.name: file
resources.title: file
resources.description: A stable digital asset

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this file [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An identifier representing this file, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this file was created [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this file was created [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this file

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of this file in bytes

fields.name: uncompressed_size_in_bytes
fields.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file: null if this file is not compressed

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: (preferred) SHA-256 checksum for this file [sha256, md5 cannot both be null]

fields.name: md5
fields.description: (allowed) MD5 checksum for this file [sha256, md5 cannot both be null]

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information

fields.name: file_format
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the digital format of this file (e.g. TSV or FASTQ): if this file is compressed, this should be its _uncompressed_ format

fields.name: compression_format
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the compression format of this file (e.g. gzip or bzip2): null if this file is not compressed

fields.name: data_type
fields.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the type of information stored in this file (e.g. RNA sequence reads): null if is_bundle is set to true

fields.name: assay_type
fields.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of experiment that generated the results summarized by this file

fields.name: analysis_type
fields.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of analytic operation that generated this file

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: A MIME type describing this file

fields.name: bundle_collection_id_namespace
fields.description: If this file is a bundle encoding more than one sub-file, this field gives the id_namespace of a collection listing the bundle's sub-file contents; null otherwise

fields.name: bundle_collection_local_id
fields.description: If this file is a bundle encoding more than one sub-file, this field gives the local_id of a collection listing the bundle's sub-file contents; null otherwise

fields.name: dbgap_study_id
fields.description: The name of a dbGaP study ID governing access control for this file, compatible for comparison to RAS user-level access control metadata

resources.name: biosample
resources.title: biosample
resources.description: A tissue sample or other physical specimen

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this biosample [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An identifier representing this biosample, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this biosample was created [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this biosample was created [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this biosample

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this biosample's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: sample_prep_method
fields.description: An OBI CV term ID (from the 'planned process' branch of the vocabulary, excluding the 'assay' subtree) describing the preparation method that produced this biosample

fields.name: anatomy
fields.description: An UBERON CV term ID used to locate the origin of this biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

resources.name: subject
resources.title: subject
resources.description: A biological entity from which a C2M2 biosample can in principle be generated

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this subject [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An identifier representing this subject, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this subject was studied [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this subject was studied [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this subject

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this subject record's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: granularity
fields.description: A CFDE CV category characterizing this subject by multiplicity

fields.name: sex
fields.description: A CFDE CV category characterizing the physiological sex of this subject

fields.name: ethnicity
fields.description: A CFDE CV category characterizing the self-reported ethnicity of this subject

fields.name: age_at_enrollment
fields.description: The age in years (with a fixed precision of two digits past the decimal point) of this subject when they were first enrolled in the primary project within which they were studied

resources.name: dcc
resources.title: DCC
resources.description: The Common Fund program or data coordinating center (DCC, identified by the given project foreign key) that produced this C2M2 instance

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this DCC, issued by the CFDE-CC

fields.name: dcc_name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this DCC

fields.name: dcc_abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this contact's DCC

fields.name: dcc_description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this DCC

fields.name: contact_email
fields.description: Email address of this DCC's primary technical contact

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: Name of this DCC's primary technical contact

fields.name: dcc_url
fields.description: URL of the front page of the website for this DCC

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the project record representing the C2M2 submission produced by this DCC

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: Foreign key identifying the project record representing the C2M2 submission produced by this DCC

resources.name: project
resources.title: project
resources.description: A node in the C2M2 project hierarchy subdividing all resources described by this DCC's C2M2 metadata

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this project [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An identifier representing this project, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this project

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this project's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this project

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this project

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this project

resources.name: project_in_project
resources.title: project_in_project
resources.description: Association between a child project and its parent

fields.name: parent_project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the parent in this parent-child project pair

fields.name: parent_project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of the containing (parent) project

fields.name: child_project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the child in this parent-child project pair

fields.name: child_project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of the contained (child) project

resources.name: collection
resources.title: collection
resources.description: A grouping of C2M2 files, biosamples and/or subjects

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this collection [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: local_id
fields.description: An identifier representing this collection, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this collection

fields.name: creation_time
fields.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this collection's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this collection

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this collection

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this collection

fields.name: has_time_series_data
fields.description: Does this collection contain time-series data? (allowed values: [true|false|null] -- true == yes, contains time-series data; false == no, doesn't contain time-series data; null == no info provided)

resources.name: collection_in_collection
resources.title: collection_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a containing collection (superset) and a contained collection (subset)

fields.name: superset_collection_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing the superset collection

fields.name: superset_collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of the superset collection

fields.name: subset_collection_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing the subset collection

fields.name: subset_collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of the subset collection

resources.name: file_describes_collection
resources.title: file_describes_collection
resources.description: Association between a summary file and an entire collection described by that file

fields.name: file_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this file

fields.name: file_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this file

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

resources.name: collection_defined_by_project
resources.title: collection_defined_by_project
resources.description: (Shallow) association between a collection and a project that defined it

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: project_id_namespace
fields.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing this project

fields.name: project_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this project

resources.name: file_in_collection
resources.title: file_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a file and a (containing) collection

fields.name: file_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this file

fields.name: file_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this file

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

resources.name: biosample_in_collection
resources.title: biosample_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a biosample and a (containing) collection

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

resources.name: subject_in_collection
resources.title: subject_in_collection
resources.description: Association between a subject and a (containing) collection

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

resources.name: file_describes_biosample
resources.title: file_describes_biosample
resources.description: Association between a biosample and a file containing information about that biosample

fields.name: file_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this file

fields.name: file_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this file

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

resources.name: file_describes_subject
resources.title: file_describes_subject
resources.description: Association between a subject and a file containing information about that subject

fields.name: file_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this file

fields.name: file_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this file

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

resources.name: biosample_from_subject
resources.title: biosample_from_subject
resources.description: Association between a biosample and its source subject

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: age_at_sampling
fields.description: The age in years (with a fixed precision of two digits past the decimal point) of this subject when this biosample was taken

resources.name: biosample_disease
resources.title: biosample_disease
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and a disease positively (e.g. cancer tumor tissue sample) OR negatively (e.g. cancer-free tissue sample) identified for that biosample

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

fields.name: association_type
fields.description: The relationship between this biosample and this disease (e.g. 'observed' or '(tested for, but) not observed')

fields.name: disease
fields.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID describing this disease

resources.name: subject_disease
resources.title: subject_disease
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 subject and a disease positively OR negatively clinically identified in that subject

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: association_type
fields.description: The relationship between this subject and this disease (e.g. 'observed' or '(tested for, but) not observed')

fields.name: disease
fields.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID describing this disease

resources.name: collection_disease
resources.title: collection_disease
resources.description: Association between a disease and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that disease

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: disease
fields.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID describing this disease

resources.name: collection_phenotype
resources.title: collection_phenotype
resources.description: Association between a phenotype and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that phenotype

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: phenotype
fields.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID describing this phenotype

resources.name: collection_gene
resources.title: collection_gene
resources.description: Association between a gene and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that gene

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: gene
fields.description: An Ensembl term ID describing this gene

resources.name: collection_compound
resources.title: collection_compound
resources.description: Association between a compound and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that compound

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: compound
fields.description: A PubChem or GlyTouCan term ID describing this compound

resources.name: collection_substance
resources.title: collection_substance
resources.description: Association between a substance and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that substance

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: substance
fields.description: A PubChem term ID describing this substance

resources.name: collection_taxonomy
resources.title: collection_taxonomy
resources.description: Association between a taxon and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that taxon

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: taxon
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this taxon

resources.name: collection_anatomy
resources.title: collection_anatomy
resources.description: Association between an UBERON anatomical term and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of the anatomical concept described by that term

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: anatomy
fields.description: An UBERON term ID

resources.name: collection_protein
resources.title: collection_protein
resources.description: Association between a protein and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that protein

fields.name: collection_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this collection

fields.name: collection_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this collection

fields.name: protein
fields.description: A UniProtKB term ID describing this protein

resources.name: subject_phenotype
resources.title: subject_phenotype
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 subject and a phenotype positively OR negatively clinically identified for that subject

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: association_type
fields.description: The relationship between this subject and this phenotype (e.g. 'observed' or '(tested for, but) not observed')

fields.name: phenotype
fields.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID describing this phenotype

resources.name: biosample_substance
resources.title: biosample_substance
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and a PubChem substance experimentally associated with that biosample

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

fields.name: substance
fields.description: A PubChem substance ID (SID) describing this substance

resources.name: subject_substance
resources.title: subject_substance
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 subject and a PubChem substance experimentally associated with that subject

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: substance
fields.description: A PubChem substance ID (SID) describing this substance

resources.name: biosample_gene
resources.title: biosample_gene
resources.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and an Ensembl gene especially relevant to it

fields.name: biosample_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this biosample

fields.name: biosample_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this biosample

fields.name: gene
fields.description: An Ensembl gene ID

resources.name: phenotype_gene
resources.title: phenotype_gene
resources.description: Association between a Human Phenotype Ontology term and an Ensembl gene especially relevant to it

fields.name: phenotype
fields.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID

fields.name: gene
fields.description: An Ensembl gene ID

resources.name: phenotype_disease
resources.title: phenotype_disease
resources.description: Association between a Human Phenotype Ontology term and a Disease Ontology term identifying a disease especially relevant to it

fields.name: phenotype
fields.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID

fields.name: disease
fields.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID

resources.name: subject_race
resources.title: subject_race
resources.description: Identification of a C2M2 subject with one or more self-selected races

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: race
fields.description: A race self-identified by this subject

resources.name: subject_role_taxonomy
resources.title: subject_role_taxonomy
resources.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a subject, (2) a subject_role (a named organism-level constituent component of a subject, like 'host', 'pathogen', 'endosymbiont', 'taxon detected inside a microbiome subject', etc.) and (3) a taxonomic label (which is hereby assigned to this particular subject_role within this particular subject)

fields.name: subject_id_namespace
fields.description: Identifier namespace for this subject

fields.name: subject_local_id
fields.description: The ID of this subject

fields.name: role_id
fields.description: The ID of the role assigned to this organism-level constituent component of this subject

fields.name: taxonomy_id
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this taxon

resources.name: assay_type
resources.title: assay_type
resources.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used to describe types of experiment that generate results stored in C2M2 files

fields.name: id
fields.description: An OBI CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this OBI term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the OBI metadata

resources.name: analysis_type
resources.title: analysis_type
resources.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used to describe analytic methods that generate C2M2 files

fields.name: id
fields.description: An OBI CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this OBI term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the OBI metadata

resources.name: ncbi_taxonomy
resources.title: ncbi_taxonomy
resources.description: List of NCBI Taxonomy Database IDs identifying taxa used to describe C2M2 subjects

fields.name: id
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying a particular taxon

fields.name: clade
fields.description: The phylogenetic level (e.g. species, genus) assigned to this taxon

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this taxon

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this taxon

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this taxon as identified by the NCBI Taxonomy DB

resources.name: anatomy
resources.title: anatomy
resources.description: List of Uber-anatomy ontology (UBERON) CV terms used to locate the origin of a C2M2 biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

fields.name: id
fields.description: An UBERON CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this UBERON term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this UBERON term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the UBERON metadata

resources.name: file_format
resources.title: file_format
resources.description: List of EDAM CV 'format:' terms used to describe formats of C2M2 files

fields.name: id
fields.description: An EDAM CV format term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this EDAM format term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM format term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the EDAM metadata

resources.name: data_type
resources.title: data_type
resources.description: List of EDAM CV 'data:' terms used to describe data in C2M2 files

fields.name: id
fields.description: An EDAM CV data term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this EDAM data term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM data term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the EDAM metadata

resources.name: disease
resources.title: disease
resources.description: List of Disease Ontology terms used to describe diseases recorded in association with C2M2 subjects or biosamples

fields.name: id
fields.description: A Disease Ontology term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Disease Ontology term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this Disease Ontology term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the Disease Ontology metadata

resources.name: phenotype
resources.title: phenotype
resources.description: List of Human Phenotype Ontology terms used to describe phenotypes recorded in association with C2M2 subjects

fields.name: id
fields.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this Human Phenotype Ontology term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this Human Phenotype Ontology term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the Human Phenotype Ontology metadata

resources.name: compound
resources.title: compound
resources.description: List of (i) GlyTouCan terms or (ii) PubChem 'compound' terms (normalized chemical structures) referenced in this submission; (ii) will include all PubChem 'compound' terms associated with any PubChem 'substance' terms (specific formulations of chemical materials) directly referenced in this submission, in addition to any 'compound' terms directly referenced

fields.name: id
fields.description: A GlyTouCan ID or a PubChem compound ID (CID)

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this compound

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this compound

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this compound

resources.name: substance
resources.title: substance
resources.description: List of PubChem 'substance' terms (specific formulations of chemical materials) directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

fields.name: id
fields.description: A PubChem substance ID (SID)

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this PubChem SID

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this PubChem SID

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this PubChem SID

fields.name: compound
fields.description: The (unique) PubChem compound ID (CID) associated with this PubChem SID

resources.name: gene
resources.title: gene
resources.description: List of Ensembl genes directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

fields.name: id
fields.description: An Ensembl gene ID (e.g. 'ENSG00000012048')

fields.name: name
fields.description: The Ensembl 'Name' for this gene (e.g. 'BRCA1')

fields.name: description
fields.description: The Ensembl 'Description' of this gene (e.g. 'BRCA1 DNA repair associated')

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of Ensembl 'Gene synonyms' for this gene (e.g. ['BRCC1', 'FANCS', 'PPP1R53', 'RNF53'])

fields.name: organism
fields.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this gene's source organism (e.g. 'NCBI:txid9606')

resources.name: protein
resources.title: protein
resources.description: List of UniProtKB proteins directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

fields.name: id
fields.description: A UniProt Knowledgebase (UniProtKB) protein ID (e.g. 'P94485')

fields.name: name
fields.description: The UniProt recommended name of this protein (e.g. 'Uncharacterized protein YnaG')

fields.name: description
fields.description: A description of this protein

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of alternate names for this protein

fields.name: organism
fields.description: OPTIONAL: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this protein's source organism (e.g. 'NCBI:txid9606')

resources.name: protein_gene
resources.title: protein_gene
resources.description: Association between a UniProtKB protein term and an Ensembl term identifying a gene encoding that protein

fields.name: protein
fields.description: A UniProt Knowledgebase (UniProtKB) protein ID (e.g. 'P94485')

fields.name: gene
fields.description: An Ensembl gene ID (e.g. 'ENSG00000012048')

resources.name: sample_prep_method
resources.title: sample_prep_method
resources.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used to describe types of preparation methods that produce C2M2 biosamples

fields.name: id
fields.description: An OBI CV term

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this OBI term

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the OBI metadata

resources.name: id_namespace
resources.title: id_namespace
resources.description: A table listing identifier namespaces registered by the DCC submitting this C2M2 instance

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of this identifier namespace

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace
